result.arabic_text: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّكُمۡ وَجَهۡرَكُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُونَ
result.translation: Kandi Allah ni We (Mana yonyine ikwiye gusengwa) mu birere no mu isi; azi ibyo muhisha (mu mitima yanyu) n’ibyo mugaragaza, kandi azi ibyo mugeraho (byose).
